# This file was generated by the YaTool build system (https://github.com/yandex/yatool),
# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.
#
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.
#
# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

find_package(linux-headers-generic REQUIRED)

add_library(Target-PowerPC-MCTargetDesc)


target_compile_options(Target-PowerPC-MCTargetDesc PRIVATE
  $<IF:$<CXX_COMPILER_ID:MSVC>,,-Wno-everything>
)

target_include_directories(Target-PowerPC-MCTargetDesc PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm18/lib/Target/PowerPC
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm18/lib/Target/PowerPC
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm18/lib/Target/PowerPC/MCTargetDesc
)

target_link_libraries(Target-PowerPC-MCTargetDesc PUBLIC
  linux-headers-generic::linux-headers-generic
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  contrib-libs-llvm18
  libs-llvm18-include
  llvm18-lib-BinaryFormat
  lib-CodeGen-LowLevelType
  llvm18-lib-MC
  llvm18-lib-Support
  Target-PowerPC-TargetInfo
  llvm18-lib-TargetParser
)

target_sources(Target-PowerPC-MCTargetDesc PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm18/lib/Target/PowerPC/MCTargetDesc/PPCAsmBackend.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm18/lib/Target/PowerPC/MCTargetDesc/PPCELFObjectWriter.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm18/lib/Target/PowerPC/MCTargetDesc/PPCELFStreamer.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm18/lib/Target/PowerPC/MCTargetDesc/PPCInstPrinter.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm18/lib/Target/PowerPC/MCTargetDesc/PPCMCAsmInfo.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm18/lib/Target/PowerPC/MCTargetDesc/PPCMCCodeEmitter.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm18/lib/Target/PowerPC/MCTargetDesc/PPCMCExpr.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm18/lib/Target/PowerPC/MCTargetDesc/PPCMCTargetDesc.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm18/lib/Target/PowerPC/MCTargetDesc/PPCPredicates.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm18/lib/Target/PowerPC/MCTargetDesc/PPCXCOFFObjectWriter.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm18/lib/Target/PowerPC/MCTargetDesc/PPCXCOFFStreamer.cpp
)
